roles.name: Store Manager
roles.description: Oversees daily operations of a retail outlet, manages staff, inventory, and customer satisfaction to meet sales targets.

meta.typicalBackground: Business management or hospitality background, leadership skills, strong customer service ethos
challenges: High staff turnover, unpredictable foot traffic, online competition forcing adaptation

sampleUseCase.scenario: A store manager notices certain promotional displays are underperforming, reorganizes store layout, and trains staff on cross-selling, resulting in a 10% sales uptick.

roles.name: Inventory Planner
roles.description: Forecasts product demand, manages stock levels to minimize overstock or stockouts, and aligns supply with store needs.

meta.typicalBackground: Supply chain or retail operations, strong data analysis, knowledge of category management
challenges: Seasonal spikes, promotional forecasting errors, shelf-life constraints for perishables

sampleUseCase.scenario: An inventory planner adjusts orders for winter coats after unseasonably warm weather forecasts, preventing surplus stock and markdown losses.

roles.name: Visual Merchandiser
roles.description: Creates in-store displays and product presentations that engage customers and boost sales conversions.

meta.typicalBackground: Design or marketing background, creativity, knowledge of consumer psychology
keyTools: POS data to evaluate display performance
challenges: Frequent promotional changes, limited floor space, brand consistency across multiple locations

sampleUseCase.scenario: A visual merchandiser sets up a thematic display for a new product launch, coordinating signage, lighting, and color schemes, resulting in a 25% uplift in product trials.

roles.name: Online Marketplace Coordinator
roles.description: Manages e-commerce listings, pricing strategies, and fulfillment processes across digital retail channels.

meta.typicalBackground: E-commerce or digital marketing background, familiarity with marketplace algorithms (Amazon, eBay)
keyTools: Product listing optimization, SEO for product pages, order management systems
challenges: Competitive pricing wars, shipping cost optimization, preventing negative reviews from shipping delays

sampleUseCase.scenario: The coordinator optimizes product titles and descriptions on Amazon, secures a 'Best Seller' badge for a tech gadget, boosting daily sales significantly.

roles.name: Customer Experience Manager
roles.description: Focuses on shopper satisfaction across all touchpointsâ€”store ambiance, online interactions, and after-sales support.

meta.typicalBackground: Marketing or service design, strong empathy, process improvement for user journeys
challenges: Aligning brand promise with actual experience, bridging online-offline synergy, quick resolution of complaints

sampleUseCase.scenario: A CX manager implements a unified loyalty app that offers personalized rewards and store navigation, boosting NPS by 20 points.
